data.title: B Site Smoke Exec + Paranoia
data.description: Smoke off defenders' entrances to B Site while using Paranoia to deal with defenders set up in B Back.

data.title: Simple A Site Exec Smokes
data.description: Cover the left side of A Site to allow your team to quickly push onto site.

data.title: A Shop to A Site Paranoia
data.description: This is a good Paranoia for the left box on A Site from A Shop.

data.title: B Main to B Site Dark Cover
data.description: This is a good set of dark covers to block both the defender side entrance points onto B Site.

data.title: B Site to Back B Site Paranoia
data.description: This is a good paranoia for back B Site. This is especially helpful during a B execute.

data.title: A Pyramid to A Bridge Dark Cover
data.description: This is a dark cover for A Site to create a one-way against defenders rotating to the site.
